entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/PREFIX/volatile/1/Box_Unbox_volatile/Box_Unbox_volatile.dll #91648
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/stfldstatic2_r/stfldstatic2_r.dll #91647
    9.0.0
  • Update `Regex` use of `SearchValues<string>` to be `OrdinalCaseInsensitive` #91645
    9.0.0
  • Use SearchValues<string> in Regex for single string searches #91644
    9.0.0
  • GCPerfSim .NET 8 vs. .NET 6 Performance Regressions #91642
    8.0.0
  • Mono is not unloading collectible assemblies #91641
  • [API Proposal]: Suggestion for improving the architecture of the Dependency Container #91638
  • No compatiable code running on the thread #91631
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Move the default property settings that were used to build the runtime pack, to `emcc-props.json` included in the runtime pack #91628
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] 7.0 -> 8.0-RC1 Performance Comparison #91626
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #91623
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #91619
  • Using the profiler or metadata APIs is it possible to know whether runtime was trimmed? #91598
  • [MT][browser] `customAttributeCount` fails #91597
    9.0.0
  • Update the System.Numerics.Tensors readme #91594
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow` and `System.Threading.Channels` fail #91593
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.LastValue looks like it could experience torn reads #91591
  • System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (The SSL connection could not be established) #91588
  • JIT: Stop sinking stores below commas in impStoreStruct #91586
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `TaskIDFromExternalContextTest` fails, Task has a negative ID #91583
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `TestParallelScheduler` fails, TaskScheduler.Default not used when no ParallelOptions are specified. #91582
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `ExceptionOnMoveNext` fails, wrong exception type #91581
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `SimultaneousStopBreakTests` fails #91579
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `CancellationTokenRegistration_DisposeAsyncWhileCallbackRunning_WaitsForCallbackToComplete` fails #91577
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Attributes #91620
  • JIT: Bad codegen with try/finally #91576
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run app as administrator at runtime with runas verb #91574
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 8/28/2023 7:02:26 PM #91621
  • Regressions in Benchmark.GetChildKeysTests #91624
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) started popping a lot since upgrading to .NET 7 #91571
    9.0.0
  • AF: m_alignpad == 0 (LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests) #91569
    9.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/gc/gcbasic/gcbasic.sh #91568
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Regressions in System.IO.Compression.Brotli #86335
    8.0.0
  • Convert DllImport to LibraryImport takes a long time when processing many DllImports #77415
    9.0.0
  • Mono build disables required warning C4244 under MSVC #91249
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/13662/13662-b/13662-b.cmd #88585
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/crossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2/crossgen2smoke_donotalwaysusecrossgen2.sh #89756
    8.0.0
  • Add Support for Saving Files with Progress Tracking in C#/.NET #91575
  • [8.0] CI failure X64Avx_NoAvx2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 - linux x64 Native AOT #90775
    8.0.0
  • [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is false when dotnet started on worker, leads to exit(0) #91528
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-node] Node process exits after C# main exits #91511
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite failing #86262
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87552
    8.0.0
  • Failing test - System.Reflection.Tests.TypeTests.TestIsValueType #91341
  • Failing test - System.Reflection.Tests.TypeTests.TestBaseType #91338
  • Failing test - System.Tests.Types.ModifiedTypeTests.TypeMembers #91339
  • [wasm] Upgrade VMs to Ubuntu 22.04 #86480
    8.0.0
  • FileStream opened with FileOptions.DeleteOnClose does not work with FileShare.Read #91484
  • Request for Extension Methods for Char in .NET Platform #91573
  • What's the difference between UseMonoRuntime and RuntimeFlavor? #58245
    8.0.0
  • Unable to load Analyzer assembly .../Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers.dll : Not a valid assembly #85082
    8.0.0
  • ECDiffieHellmanOpenSsl throws PlatformNotSupported on macOS #89006
    Future
  • BigInteger has a buggy assert #84991
    Future
  • [browser] configure location of AppBundle directory #91584
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose negotiated cipher suite and TLS protocols via HttpResponseMessage #91460
    9.0.0
  • .net 7 Application not running when deployed to windows server. #89850
    Future
  • [native aot] Unhandled exceptions are not printed to console #91298
    9.0.0
  • GCMemoryInfo.MemoryLoadBytes is not implemented on FreeBSD #64935
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix overly aggressive assert about array rank #91651
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable stfldstatic2_r, Box_Unbox_volatile on osx-arm64 #91650
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91649
    area-System.Security
  • Move CoreCLR community platforms to build in the runtime-community CI leg #91646
    area-Infrastructure
  • Separate running PAL tests out to their own jobs/steps. #91643
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reduce IL size for `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Optimize collection download, increase diffs timeout #91637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `HostApiInvokerApp` for `BundleProbe` test (remove `BundleProbeTester` app) #91636
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [Release/8.0] Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91635
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove some dead/unnecessary build steps #91634
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ENABLE_CHECKED_CASTS build and transform it into ENABLE_CHECKED_BUILDS_ option #91630
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Activate Disabled HTTP/3 Test #91629
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91627
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91602
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Ensure VN handles both forms of the xarch shift instructions for SIMD #91601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add windows stylearguments format to coreclr test scripts #91600
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91599
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Start vectorizing TensorPrimitives #91596
    area-System.Numerics
  • Validate hardcoded offsets to PROFILE_PLATFORM_SPECIFIC_DATA struct #91595
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Respect StackTraceHiddenAttribute #91572
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric

Merged

  • Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91622
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Include dotnet/hostfxr/hostpolicy symbols in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host/Runtime packages #91031
    area-Host
  • [NativeAOT] Fix formatting of assertion failures and fail-fasts #91300
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove allocation in GetPropertyAsDWord for CNG. #91521
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91589
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Fix pinvoke support. #91555
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Re-enable an assert in BigInteger #91158
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91473
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Fix handling of `--help` in the build-commons.sh #91590
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91565
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91424
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] document WasmAppDir #91585
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Use the major version for the net_.0 version in create mono dotnet step #91452
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64, RISC-V] Fix the assertion error for MethodTable::GetLoongArch64PassStructInRegisterFlags() and MethodTable::GetRiscv64PassStructInRegisterFlags(). #91570
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Remove unused CLR_E_BIND_* errors #91488
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Delete unused methods from CoreCLR PAL #91554
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix usage of load library #91490
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add FreeBSD case to gcenv. #91524
    os-freebsd, area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Interlocked.Or/And for arm64 #91557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64: Use stlur for volatile stores #91553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91455
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Do not trim XUnitWrapperGenerator #91542
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64, RISC-V] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Making installer tests pass on OSX-arm64 in Release build #91519
    area-Host
  • Cleanup native build warnings and unnecessary logos #91563
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91559
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][jit] Enable all X86Base intrinsics #91393
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Reduce work done by RuntimeHelpers.TryGetHashCode on Mono #91516
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91472
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91471
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91470
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91311
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, regression-from-last-release, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90552
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix partial munmapping #2395
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix the wasm test build scripts #2394
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support emulated unwinding for WASI #2387
  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default `--interactive` to `true` across the commands #35165
  • Set `AssemblyTitle` from `Title` or `Description` #35145

Closed

  • `dotnet tool restore` cannot find the local manifest file #33921
  • Stamp Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver.dll with Git SHA #9856
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2260574 #35170
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35169
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add mac signing to the other fork of the code path #35168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add tar.gz (Docker Archive) file writing #35151
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Verify.Xunit package version #35146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move to granular opt-in for interceptors preview #35024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs to 6.0.4 #35158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add mac signing to the other fork of the code path #35167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Handle multiple tags wtihin one image #35138
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update collection-expressions.md #7512

Merged

  • Collection expressions: nullable value type targets #7513

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source generator warning duplication and missing link and description #69826
  • Source generator - fail to generate source with message 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces #69819

Closed

  • Regression in VS 17.7 Preview 1: false positive for CS8602 after call to Assert.IsNotNull (NUnit). No false positive in VS 17.6. #68885
    17.8
  • Can not resolve symbol method when using System.Diagnostics.Conditional #69773
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34105.100 #69818
  • Remove WellKnownMembers.System_ReadOnlySpan_T__op_Implicit_ReadOnlySpan_T_Array if not needed #69692
    17.8
  • (Linux only?) Method group intrinsic type ignores params and default arguments #69797

PullRequests

Created

  • Only switch focus when text identifier has focus in rename flyout #69825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump NuGet version #69824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests. (#69690)" #69823
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Update packages to prep for NuGet publish (#69497)" #69822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify the test to cover the scenario #69821
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Fix folding range bug in C# extension #69817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipe #69816
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't hit the file cache multiple times unnecessarily #69815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make completion handler more resilient #69795
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.8
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Test #69814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Mark export attributes as Inherited = false #69810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid does not support 'record'-based objects #50534
  • Issue with enableShadowCopy and shared shadowCopyDirectory in Multi-Environment Deployment #50531
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #50529
  • Improve debugging of RequestTimeoutPolicy metadata #50526
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.2.23451.1] SPOTClient reported Telerik.UI.for.Blazor package error on the login page. #50525
  • Add HttpContext.Endpoint property #50522
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #50519
  • Blazor SSR - can't wrap layout Body with interactive component #50518
  • Add the ability to view the authentication server session identifier returned from ITicketStore. #50517

Closed

  • Method 'DisposeAsync' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #50520
  • It should be possible to request an optional injected dependency #24378
    Backlog
  • Selenium updates are broken #49869
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50493
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50492
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50495
  • Redis OutputCache no longer works on rc1 #50452
  • StreamRendering displays additional tags when large data is processed #50198
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] WebAssemblyComponentsEndpointOptions.cs should be defined in `AddWebAssemblyRenderMode` not in the DI container #49753
    8.0-rc1
  • The type TypedResults does not exist in the namespace Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http #50527
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50382

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50530
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Update RemoteAuthenticationOptions.cs #50524
    area-security, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update selenium versions #50511
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `460ae98` to `8a6feab` #50476
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView always has a scroll bar on iOS #17224
  • Implement DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource just like in WPF #17223
  • VisualDiagnostics.GetSourceInfo on Style object returns the wrong source location. #17222
    .NET 8 GA
  • blazor hybrid blazorwebview mixed mode http content and untrusted ssl certificate problem #17219
  • Mac/iOS: Clipping prevents from catching events in the background #17218
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Project does not work with MAUI without manual edit of project file #17217
  • Memory leak with GraphicsView in windows #17214
  • [MAUI] Recipe App build failed with error: One or more duplicate file names were detected #17213
  • [regression/8.0] Unable to access Implicit Styles #17212
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] - DataBinding not working inside ScrollView with nested elements #17211
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Binding IconImageSource on MenuFlyoutItem does not update on runtime. #17210
  • OpenAsync with OpenFileRequest opens share window on iphone #17209
  • [MAUI] The 'New Recipe' page will crash in landscape mode on iOS simulator #17208
    .NET 8 GA
  • Editor placed in Grid disappears when size changed #17206
  • SwipeView does not work correctly on iOS when opened programmatically #17204
  • TypeConverterAttribute bug with custom type converter #17203
  • Setting the `Style` property using triggers within a Style resource freezes the UI #17202

Closed

  • MaximumWidthRequest property behaves differently in Windows and Android #7366
    Backlog
  • The placeholder is displayed incorrectly on iOS and MacCatalyst #16916
    .NET 8 GA
  • Animated gifs are not working properly #7021
    Backlog
  • SwipeView open/close methods don't work as expected #16858

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
  • Add View docs #17220
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Update with internal flow #17216
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Port the specificity concept to Bindings #17215
    Under Consideration
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix templates for Linux builds #17205
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Grid rows ios fix #17199
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Best pratice for DB downgrade through efbundle in CI/CD #31637
  • Support change tracking and lazy-loading proxies for complex types #31634
  • Support value generation for complex properties #31633
  • ChangingAndChangedNotifications performs incorrect updates on Many-To-Many Relationships #31631
  • How to manage a generated migration that is using a delete class #31630
  • TPC and Guid Id #31629

Closed

  • Query: add support for projecting JSON entities that have been composed on #31365
    8.0.0
  • Delay first retry in Transient Error Handling with Azure SQL #27826
    8.0.0
  • `.First()` on SqlQuery results in exception #31623
  • Problem while saving Byte array in mysql database with entity framework core #31614
  • Default value forced when converting an EXISTING string column to be non-nullable #31595
  • DetectChanges changes EntityEntry.OriginalValues #31592
  • double 0 saves as 1 ??? #31589
  • Cannot check if owned entity is null using Cosmos DB provider #31579
  • EF Core does not include boolean column with default value in SQL INSERT statement #31538
  • FromSqlRaw not working for me in .net 6 #31457
  • Feature request: add support of LINQ expression for value of primitive types #31445

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31641
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: use Point-Read when the key is a Guid. #31639

Merged

  • Fix to #31365 - Query: add support for projecting JSON entities that have been composed on #31391
  • Rename SQL Azure to Azure SQL #31638
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31636
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31635
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Increase the retry delay for throttling errors on Azure SQL. #31612
  • Block has-pending-model-changes when EF < 8 #31605
  • Allow primitive collection mappings to be returned directly from provider #31619
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31632
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31603
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 #31628
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
